meanings.definition: A woman's undergarment for supporting the breasts.
meanings.sent1: She wore comfortable brassieres every day.
meanings.sent2: The store sells a variety of brassieres in different sizes.
meanings.sent3: When she accidentally wore her brassieres inside out, she laughed at the mix-up.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence soared as if wearing invisible brassieres of strength.
meanings.sent5: The delicate lace on her brassieres added a touch of elegance to her outfit.

meanings.sent1: She carefully brassieres her dress before the event.
meanings.sent2: He brassieres the necklace around his neck.
meanings.sent3: The magician brassieres the rings together in a surprising trick.
meanings.sent4: The bond between them was as strong as the clasp that brassieres them together.
meanings.sent5: She brassieres the pieces of the puzzle to reveal the hidden picture.
